# Tex è¯­æ³•

âˆ‚râˆ‚Ï‰r(yÏ‰Ï‰)=(yÏ‰Ï‰){(logâ¡y)r+âˆ‘i=1r(âˆ’1)irâ‹¯(râˆ’i+1)(logâ¡y)râˆ’iÏ‰i}\frac {\partial^r} {\partial \omega^r} \left(\frac {y^{\omega}} {\omega}\right) = \left(\frac {y^{\omega}} {\omega}\right) \left\{(\log y)^r + \sum_{i=1}^r \frac {(-1)^i r \cdots (r-i+1) (\log y)^{r-i}} {\omega^i} \right\} âˆ‚Ï‰râˆ‚râ€‹(Ï‰yÏ‰â€‹)=(Ï‰yÏ‰â€‹){(logy)r+i=1âˆ‘râ€‹Ï‰i(âˆ’1)irâ‹¯(râˆ’i+1)(logy)râˆ’iâ€‹}

ä»£ç  
$$
\frac {\partial^r} {\partial \omega^r} \left(\frac {y^{\omega}} {\omega}\right)
= \left(\frac {y^{\omega}} {\omega}\right) \left\{(\log y)^r + \sum_{i=1}^r \frac {(-1)^i r \cdots (r-i+1) (\log y)^{r-i}} {\omega^i} \right\}
$$

::: demo [react] ä¸€ä¸ª React Demo

```js
export default class App extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { message: "ååˆ†å¸…" };
  }
  render() {
    return (
      <div className="box-react">
        Mr.Hope <span>{this.state.message}</span>
      </div>
    );
  }
}
```

```css
.box-react span {
  color: red;
}
```
